title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 39 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 39 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: I said, I will take heed to my ways, that I sin not with my tongue: I will keep my mouth with a bridle, while the wicked is before me.
lineList.cn: （大卫的诗，交与伶长耶杜顿）我曾说，我要谨慎我的言行，免得我舌头犯罪。恶人在我面前的时候，我要用嚼回环勒住我的口。

lineList.en: I was dumb with silence, I held my peace, even from good; and my sorrow was stirred.
lineList.cn: 我默然无声，连好话也不出口。我的愁苦就发动了。

lineList.en: My heart was hot within me, while I was musing the fire burned: then spake I with my tongue,
lineList.cn: 我的心在我里面发热。我默想的时候，火就烧起，我便用舌头说话。

lineList.en: LORD, make me to know mine end, and the measure of my days, what it is: that I may know how frail I am.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你叫我晓得我身之终，我的寿数几何，叫我知道我的生命不长。

lineList.en: Behold, thou hast made my days as an handbreadth; and mine age is as nothing before thee: verily every man at his best state is altogether vanity. Selah.
lineList.cn: 你使我的年日，窄如手掌。我一生的年数，在你面前，如同无有。各人最稳妥的时候，真是全然虚幻。（细拉）

lineList.en: Surely every man walketh in a vain shew: surely they are disquieted in vain: he heapeth up riches, and knoweth not who shall gather them.
lineList.cn: 世人行动实系幻影。他们忙乱，真是枉然。积蓄财宝，不知将来有谁收取。

lineList.en: And now, Lord, what wait I for? my hope is in thee.
lineList.cn: 主阿，如今我等什么呢。我的指望在乎你。

lineList.en: Deliver me from all my transgressions: make me not the reproach of the foolish.
lineList.cn: 求你救我脱离一切的过犯。不要使我受愚顽人的羞辱。

lineList.en: I was dumb, I opened not my mouth; because thou didst it.
lineList.cn: 因我所遭遇的是出于你，我默然不语。

lineList.en: Remove thy stroke away from me: I am consumed by the blow of thine hand.
lineList.cn: 求你把你的责罚，从我身上免去。因你手的责打，我便消灭。

lineList.en: When thou with rebukes dost correct man for iniquity, thou makest his beauty to consume away like a moth: surely every man is vanity. Selah.
lineList.cn: 你因人的罪恶，惩罚他的时候，叫他的笑容消灭，（的笑容或作所喜爱的）如衣被虫所咬。世人真是虚幻。（细拉）

lineList.en: Hear my prayer, O LORD, and give ear unto my cry; hold not thy peace at my tears: for I am a stranger with thee, and a sojourner, as all my fathers were.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿。求你听我的祷告，留心听我的呼求。我流泪，求你不要静默无声。因为我在你面前是客旅，是寄居的，像我列祖一般。

lineList.en: O spare me, that I may recover strength, before I go hence, and be no more.
lineList.cn: 求你宽容我，使我在去而不返之先，可以力量复原。
